ProteinName	Upstream stimulatory factor 1 (Class B basic helix-loop-helix protein 11) (bHLHb11) (Major late transcription factor 1)
GeneName	USF1 BHLHB11 USF
Length	310
Function	Transcription factor that binds to a symmetrical DNA sequence (E-boxes) (5'-CACGTG-3') that is found in a variety of viral and cellular promoters.
